tags: Value for money,
review: I Recently visited Dr Pavan K for a routine cleaning, and I was thoroughly impressed with the experience. The entire procedure was Painless and comfortable, and I appreciated the gentle Care taken to avoid any Bleeding. Dr Pavan K was Professional, meticulous, and attentive, Ensuring that my teeth were Cleaned thoroughly without any discomfort. The office staff was also friendly and efficient making the entire visit Smooth and stressfree. I highly recommend Dr Pavan K for anyone looking for a top notch dental experience.
